prototype

Class CheckersPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • prototype.CheckersPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CheckersPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is the panel in which most of the graphical work is done. It draws the checkerboard and calls most of the game logic functions.
    Version:
    stable build 17 April 2018
    Author:
    Gionata Bonazzi, Cole Sellers, Brendan Cronan, Rosa Fleming
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • newGame

        public void newGame(java.lang.String player1,
                    java.lang.String player2,
                    GameMode gameMode)
        Start a new game. This method contains all methods calls to make sure a brand new game is started.
        Parameters:
        player1 - The first player's name.
        player2 - The second player's name.
        gameMode - the game mode for the new game.
